yaH saqhasrE#Naq yaja#tE praqjApa#tiqH Kaluq vai paqSUna#sRujataq tA(gg)strai#dhAtaq vIyE#-naiqvAsRu#jataq ya EqvaM ~MviqdvA(gg) strai#dhAtaqvIyE#napaqSukA#mOq yaja#tEq yasmA#dEqva yOnE$H praqjApa#tiH paqSUnasRu#jataq tasmA#dEqvainA$nth sRujataq 
upai#naqmutta#ra(gm) saqhasra#M namati dEqvatA$ByOq vA EqSha A vRu#ScyatEq yO yaqkShya ityuqktvA na yaja#tE traidhAtaqvIyE#na yajEtaq sarvOq vA EqSha yaqj~jO - [  ]  33
